version_description: We addressed some minor issues in order to improve the user experience.

Syncing progress between devices with Facebook is now easier
More variety in levels
Numerous minor improvements

Lots of visual improvements
Barrel pig can now be popped with matches
Pigs no longer recover from stun
Various tweaks to level content and visuals

Thanks for playing Angry Birds Match, and for sharing your feedback! We've considered your feedback and made some changes to make Angry Birds Match even better!

– First, finding new Hatchlings is the #1 priority. Find new friends for Hatchlings, and they will reward you handsomely!
– Second, hats. Now, dress your Hatchling pals in the coolest headgear and the cutest outfits!
– Third, more chests. We’ve added more mystery chests filled with sweet rewards. Now where are those keys?
Minor fixes and improvements.
We’ve made a bunch of tweaks, fixes, and visual improvements. Plus, now you get coins when you finish a level with moves left over. Cha-ching!

– Participate in special events and earn boosters and cute new outfits for your Hatchling friends!
– Each outfit collected will award bonus coins!
– Visual improvements and other minor tweaks and fixes.
Minor fixes and tweaks.

– MORE levels! Play over 200 all-new matching challenges.
– TOUGHER enemies! Say hello to Boomerang Pig.
– FANCY stuff! We spruced up the place with new outfits and backgrounds!
We fixed some level freeze issues.

- Lots of new outfits to collect!
- Exciting new event: Forest Trail!

- New event: Join the Big Dig treasure hunt!
- An all-new area for the history buffs out there.
- Spectacular new outfits!

NEW iMessage Stickers! Share some Hatchling cuteness with your friends with a FREE sticker pack. 
MORE exciting events and MORE event levels!
A DAZZLING new intro video to introduce players to Angry Birds Match.

NEW iMessage Stickers! Share some Hatchling cuteness with your friends with a FREE sticker pack. 
MORE exciting events and MORE event levels!
A DAZZLING new intro video to introduce players to Angry Birds Match.
We addressed some minor issues in order to improve the user experience.

Trick or treat has never been this sweet! Collect new creepy costumes, play new levels, and help the Hatchlings get all dressed up for Halloween in a special, limited-time event. Your reward: the mysterious Grand Halloween Chest. What could be in there?

Chill with 6 new hatchlings in a winter update that’s cooler than cool. 
– 6 NEW Hatchlings to meet!
– NEW Winter outfits to collect!
– NEW winter area!
– NEW levels!

It’s holiday time! Those naughty Hatchlings are sneaking into Santa’s workshop to get a peek at their gifts. Help them dress up so they don’t get caught.
– New holiday playground!
– Meet 3 new Hatchlings!
– Collect 9 new outfits!
– Complete over 10 holiday challenges!

Nothing says Happy New Year like Cacti! 
1. New Cactus Piggy causing trouble!
2. Alerts so you don't miss out on free things!
3. Improvements and minor bug fixes.

"Arrrrrr ye ready for a pirate party, mateys? The Hatchlings are! Help these little swashbucklers make it the best party ever. Be careful, you might get hooked! Har har har…
– NEW Pirate Island event!
– Meet 3 new Hatchlings.
– Collect piratey new outfits.
– Complete all challenges and uncover buried treasure!"

The Hatchlings are catching feelings this Valentine's Day. Are YOU?
- Explore an enchanting new area: The Secret Garden!
- Meet 3 new sweethearts with 9 exclusive outfits!
- Complete our Sweetstakes event to restore the Secret Garden to its glory!
- Hatchlings love sweets and so do we! Time to play event levels and collect chocolate! How many pieces can you find?

Get down (way down) with the Hatchlings in a musical production under the sea! Meet three new Hatchlings, collect pearls, and fix up their instruments so they can get into the groove.
– Join the Underwater event!
– Collect pearls & fix the instruments!
– Collect 9 NEW outfits!
– NEW area: Nighttime Tiki Party! New Hatchlings, new outfits, & new challenges!
We fixed some issues related to claiming previous seasonal event rewards.

Help the Hatchlings bring in the spring! These spring chicks are celebrating the season of new beginnings in style. Collect flowers and watch those cherry blossoms bloom!
– Meet 3 new Hatchlings.
– Collect 9 new spring outfits.
– Take part in 9 events with over 200 levels + Challenge Mode.
– Complete everything to unlock the Grand Cherry Blossom Chest!

Get ready for a good old fashioned Hatchling hoedown! These little buckaroos are hosting a county fair for the ages. There's gonna be country music, and fried food, and plenty of southern hospitality. Don't miss it, y'all!
– Meet 3 new Hatchlings.
– Collect 9 new countryfied outfits.
– Take part in 9 events with over 200 levels + Challenge Mode.
Minor fixes. One of the Hatchlings found a bug and started freaking out! Don't worry, we took care of it.

Great Scott! The Hatchlings managed to transport themselves back in time to a prehistoric jungle. Help them fix up their time machines and get back to modern day – through special challenges in this limited time event!
– Meet 3 new hatchling friends!
– Collect new outfits!
– Complete all challenges for dino-sized rewards!
New stuff coming soon! But for now, just squashing a few bugs and making some minor improvements.

"Arrrrrr ye ready for a pirate party, mateys? The Hatchlings are! Help these little swashbucklers make it the best party ever. Be careful, you might get hooked! Har har har…
– NEW Pirate Island event!
– Meet 3 new Hatchlings.
– Collect piratey new outfits.
– Complete all challenges and uncover buried treasure!"

The Hatchlings are putting on a benefit concert with Imagine Dragons to support the Tyler Robinson Foundation. There will be challenges to complete, outfits to collect, and music from Imagine Dragons! Get involved at TRF.org.
– New Event featuring Imagine Dragons!
– 3 new Hatchlings.
– 6 new dragony outfits.

The Hatchlings are putting on a benefit concert with Imagine Dragons to support the Tyler Robinson Foundation. There will be challenges to complete, outfits to collect, and music from Imagine Dragons! Get involved at TRF.org.
– New Event featuring Imagine Dragons!
– 3 new Hatchlings.
– 6 new dragony outfits.

It’s the holliest, jolliest time of year, and the hatchlings can’t wait to open their gifts. About that, we’re going to need you to help get them some festive outfits. 
– Play a new holiday event!
– Meet 3 festive new Hatchlings
– Collect 9 cheerful new outfits
– Earn a stockingful of rewards!
– Join a limited-time Angry Birds 10th anniversary event!

The hatchlings are gearing up for The Angry Birds Movie 2! 
- Our intrepid adventurers Samsam, Zoe and Vivi find themselves in Zeta's Lair. What will they find? 
- Nine unique outfits to unlock - three each hatchling! 
New Clear All Objective 
- Your mission, should you choose to accept: collect a set amount of items on the board in new levels!
New stuff coming soon! But for now, just squashing a few bugs and making some minor improvements.

"It’s cherry blossom time! Celebrate the spring season with the Hatchlings in a limited time event under a canopy of beautiful pink flowers. 
– Meet 3 new Hatchling friends!
– Complete new springtime challenges
– Collect new spring outfits for your wardrobe.
– Earn fresh rewards!
– New BINGO mini-event coming soon. Stay tuned!"

"Ring in the Lunar New Year with the Hatchlings in a special event! Complete all Lunar New Year quests and open the Grand Oriental Chest bursting with goodies.
– Meet 3 new Hatchlings and collect new outfits to celebrate the Year of the Pig in the Lunar New Year event.
– New year, new look – we’ve made some visual upgrades to make Angry Birds match more accessible."

Join the Hatchlings for a Halloween so sweet – it’s SCARY! The Hatchlings are going all out for All Hallows’ with creepy costumes and spooky challenges so sweet, you could just eat them right up!
– NEW Halloween event Oct 10 - 31!
– Meet 3 new Hatchlings.
– Collect 9 sweet costumes.
– New blocks! Watch out for the new Ice Block and Treat Box.

You're invited to a fancy tea party hosted by the Hatchlings! Pull up a chair and enjoy a nice warm cup of tea, new challenges and tasty rewards! Just mind your manners please.
– Meet 3 extra polite new Hatchlings.
– Collect daintily-designed new outfits.
– Complete some proper new challenges.

You’re invited to a fancy tea party hosted by the Hatchlings! Pull up a chair and enjoy a nice warm cup of tea, new challenges and tasty rewards! Just mind your manners please.
– Meet 3 extra polite new Hatchlings.
– Collect daintily-designed new outfits.
– Complete some proper new challenges.

It’s the holliest, jolliest time of year, and the hatchlings can’t wait to open their gifts. About that, we’re going to need you to help get them some festive outfits. 
– Play a new holiday event!
– Meet 3 festive new Hatchlings
– Collect 9 cheerful new outfits
– Earn a stockingful of rewards!

– Meet 3 new Hatchlings and collect new outfits to celebrate the Year of the Pig in the Lunar New Year event.
– New year, new look – we’ve made some visual upgrades to make Angry Birds match more accessible."

It's the most lovey-dovey time of the year, and your favorite matchmakers are all aflutter over a new week-long Valentine's event! Take on new challenges to earn some lovely rewards. 
We've also made improvements to dig quests that we're sure you're going to love <3

"It’s cherry blossom time! Celebrate the spring season with the Hatchlings in a limited time event under a canopy of beautiful pink flowers. 
– Meet 3 new Hatchling friends!
– Complete new springtime challenges
– Collect new spring outfits for your wardrobe.
– Earn fresh rewards!
– New BINGO mini-event coming soon. Stay tuned!"

Easter is here! Join the Hatchlings for a good old fashioned egg hunt in a special event celebrating the season of new beginnings.
– New Hatchlings to meet!
– New challenges to take on!
– New rewards to earn!

Spice up your Hatchlings’ wardrobes in the new outfit studio! We’re introducing a new way to see all of your Hatchlings, check out their adorable apparel, and even craft outfits to complete your collection and collect fabulous rewards!
New stuff coming soon! But for now, just squashing a few bugs and making some minor improvements.

Arrrrrrrrr you ready for a new event filled with adventure, pirates, and plenty of treasure? The Hatchlings are commandeering your mobile device for an all-new campaign!
– Play a new Pirate event to earn style-savvy outfits and legendary rewards
– New underwater area – coming soon!
– New Hammer Boost – Drop the hammer to smack pigs and destroy obstacles!

Arrrrrrrrr you ready for a new event filled with adventure, pirates, and plenty of treasure? The Hatchlings are commandeering your mobile device for an all-new campaign!
– Play a new Pirate event to earn style-savvy outfits and legendary rewards
– New underwater area – coming soon!
– New Hammer Boost – Drop the hammer to smack pigs and destroy obstacles!

It’s summertime, and you know what that means – time for beaches and barbeque! Meet three new scrumptiously adorable Hatchlings and hit the beach in a sizzling new summer event!
– Meet 3 new Hatchlings.
– Collect some summery new outfits.
– Take on challenges in the summer campaign to earn rewards!
New stuff coming soon! But for now, just squashing a few bugs and making some minor improvements.

- Our intrepid adventurers Samsam, Zoe and Vivi find themselves in Zeta's Lair. What will they find?
- Nine unique outfits to unlock - three each hatchling!
New Clear All Objective
- Your mission, should you choose to accept: collect a set amount of items on the board in new levels!

Get ready for a magical matching journey! Enter the Twilight Forest – an enchanted wood flitting with fairies, teaming with beasts (ahem, piggies), and overflowing with fun challenges!
– Meet 3 new Hatchlings
– Collect 9 whimsical new outfits
– Complete challenges and earn magnificent rewards!

BOO! The Hatchlings get all dressed up for a new Halloween update! Join the event, meet 3 new Hatchling trick-or-treaters, and unlock their crazy-cute costumes. Finish all challenges and open a super spooky chest! What’s inside? Tricks? Treats? Find out – if you dare! 
– Play a new Halloween event!
– Meet new Hatchlings!
– Collect Halloween costumes!
– Earn plenty of treats!
New stuff coming soon! But for now, just squashing a few bugs and making some minor improvements.
New stuff coming soon! But for now, just squashing a few bugs and making some minor improvements.

Pull up a bale of hay! We’re headed for an autumn fair to admire the changing colors and cooling temperatures of the best season of the year! Spice up your life in this limited time event!
– Meet 3 new Hatchlings and collect their cozy autumn outfits!
– Try out NEW pre-game boosters!
– Earn special autumnal rewards!

Pull up a bale of hay! We’re headed for an autumn fair to admire the changing colors and cooling temperatures of the best season of the year! Spice up your life in this limited time event!
– Meet 3 new Hatchlings and collect their cozy autumn outfits!
– Try out NEW pre-game boosters!
– Earn special autumnal rewards!

– Play a new holiday event!
– Meet 3 festive new Hatchlings
– Collect 9 cheerful new outfits
– Earn a stockingful of rewards!

It’s the holliest, jolliest time of year, and the hatchlings can’t wait to open their gifts. About that, we’re going to need you to help get them some festive outfits. 
– Play a new holiday event!
– Meet 3 festive new Hatchlings

It’s the Lunar New Year and the Hatchlings are bringing in the year of the rat with a new event! To unlock all of the rewards, you will have to be quick and clever – just like the rat!
– Play the Lunar New Year event!
– Meet 3 new Hatchlings!
– Complete challenges and earn a wealth of rewards!

It’s the Lunar New Year and the Hatchlings are bringing in the year of the rat with a new event! To unlock all of the rewards, you will have to be quick and clever – just like the rat!
– Play the Lunar New Year event!
– Meet 3 new Hatchlings!
– Complete challenges and earn a wealth of rewards!
– NEW Booster! Use the Disco Ball to clear all pieces of one color from the board!
There’s no real update, we just wanted to say hi. Just kidding – but we’re only making a few minor improvements.

Look! Off in the distance! Could that be spring approaching? Judging by the pink blossoms, it just might be. Either way, it’s never too early for a party!
– Play a new Cherry Blossom event with three new Hatchling faces!
– Earn special springtime rewards!
– New! Hatchling Encore – Earn outfits from past events!

Look! Off in the distance! Could that be spring approaching? Judging by the pink blossoms, it just might be. Either way, it’s never too early for a party!
– Play a new Cherry Blossom event with three new Hatchling faces!
– Earn special springtime rewards!
– New! Hatchling Encore – Earn outfits from past events!
– Now use Apple ID to sign in and save your progress!

– It’s Easter time! Take part in a new Easter event, meet new Eastery Hatchlings, and crack open a special Easter chest full of Easter goodies. Yay Easter! 
– Now take part in seasonal events by playing normal Main levels. Make progress – and earn seasonal rewards too!
New stuff coming soon! But for now, just squashing a few bugs and making some minor improvements.

– The Hatchlings go above and beyond in a new space-themed area – get ready to go Over the Moon!
– Take part in a new seasonal event – Summer Camp!
– NEW! Done with all of the Main levels? Join the new Champions Tournament and challenge other top players!

Arrrrr you ready for an all-new event on the high seas? Take part in the new Pirates event, join new Hatchlings, and complete challenges to collect a chest full of treasure!
– Play the new Pirate event!
– Meet 3 new Hatchlings!
– Complete challenges to earn treasure!

The sun is shining and the Hatchlings are getting ready for a big Summer Party! Have some fun in the sun with new Hatchling friends and collect new outfits and rewards!
– Play the new Summer Party event – coming soon!
– Event Levels are back! Play special event levels to get the weekly Hatchling outfits!

Dust off your brooms, witches and wizards, it’s time for a magical new event in Angry Birds Match! Take on enchanting new challenges and meet three new bewitching Hatchling friends!
– Magic Event coming soon!
– NEW! UPGRADE your outfits to boost your outfit bonus and look extra fabulous on the leaderboards with a shiny new frame!

BOO! Get your goodie bags ready for a terrifyingly cute and spine-chillingly sweet Halloween event full of tricks and treats!
– Meet 3 new Hatchling trick-or-treaters!
– Complete spooky new challenges!
– Earn sweet rewards!
Just fixing a few minor things. Hey, cute like this doesn't just happen on its own.

Pull up a bale of hay! We’re headed for an autumn fair to admire the changing colors and cooling temperatures of the best season of the year! Spice up your life in this limited time event!
– Play the new Autumn Fair event!
– Meet 3 new Hatchlings and collect their cozy autumn outfits!

It’s the holliest, jolliest time of year, and the hatchlings can’t wait to open their gifts. About that, we’re going to need you to help get them some festive outfits. 
– Play a new holiday event!
– Meet 3 festive new Hatchlings
– Collect 9 cheerful new outfits
– Earn a stockingful of rewards!
Fixing bugs and whatnot, nothing major to report. How are you today?

Lunar New Year is here, and everyone is excited for the Year of the Ox! Get ready for a totally ox-ome celebration with the Hatchlings of Angry Birds Match!
– NEW Lunar New Year event!
– Meet NEW Hatchlings!
– Complete challenges and earn some ox-cellent rewards!
– NEW gem deal in the shop – now get extra gems when buying bundles for the first time!

Look! Off in the distance! Could that be spring approaching? Judging by the pink blossoms, it just might be. Either way, it’s never too early for a party!
– Play a new Cherry Blossom event
– Earn special springtime rewards!
– Meet NEW Hatchlings!
Just making a few minor updates to make Angry Birds Match even cuter!
It’s Easter time! Take part in a new Easter event, meet new Eastery Hatchlings, and crack open a special Easter chest full of Easter goodies. Yay Easter!

It’s summertime, and you know what that means – ice cream at the beach! Meet three new adorable Hatchlings and hit the beach in a sweet new summer event!
– Meet 3 new Hatchlings and collect their summery outfits.
– NEW: Take your win streak to new heights in the Zen Streak event!

Lunar New Year is here, and everyone is excited for the Year of the Tiger! Get ready to rock the stripes with the Hatchlings of Angry Birds Match!
– NEW Lunar New Year event!
– Meet NEW Hatchlings!
– Complete challenges and earn rewards!

– It’s Easter time! Take part in a new Easter event, meet new Eastery Hatchlings, and crack open a special Easter chest full of Easter goodies. Yay Easter! 
– Now take part in seasonal events by playing normal Main levels. Make progress – and earn seasonal rewards too!
– NEW! Done with all of the Main levels? Join the new Champions Tournament and challenge other top players!
